page.title: 10OUTSIDE GOLHANGER SCHOOL
page.content: Goldhanger school stands in Church Street.The shape of the school is a cross.The windows in the school are very high so the children would not look out and ignore the teachers.The school is a church school just like our school.The bricks scho9l is built of are very old and soft,so birds peck holes in them.The school's roof is slated,but on one side are new tiles because the old slates were dangerous.In the playground there is a hole where a Elm tree once stood and the ground keeps subsiding where the roots were burnt out.When the school had games they went to the rectory garden,as there was no playing field. The school has a carved sign across the roof saying"Goldhanger School 1874".The gates at the school are very dangerous as you can catch your fingers.
